::Spitfire:;

She smiled at sees another reptile bot.  "I'm Spitfire. Pleased to 
meet you."  She was glad to finally find a friend in this war.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "ilovealllizards" <ilovealllizards@p...> 
wrote:
> Kamodia: Yes, I'm a Maximal. Auto Guns, reconize Spitfire as a 
friend!
> *Kamodia calls out to the AutoGuns* *Kamodia walks closer to 
Spitfire*
> Kamodia: Hi, I'm Kamodia.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <logomorph@h...>
> To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> Sent: Monday, July 17, 2000 7:18 PM
> Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
> 
> 
> > ::Spitfire::
> > "If you are a Maximal, then I shall join."

<ilovealllizards@p...>

> > > *Kamodia hears Spitfire on her Commlink* Kamodia: You wish to 
join

> > > *Kamodia says into her Commlink to Spitfire. Kamodia runs 
outside
> > the base*
> > > Kamodia: Do you wish to join us? *Kamodia calls out to Spitfire*

> > > > ::Spitfire::
> > > >
> > > > She slithered along.  Her tongue picking up the scent of 
maximals.
> > > > She kept going untill she reached her destination.  It may 
have
> > taken
> > > > her  awhile to get there.  She transformed into bot mode.  
She had
> > > > her hood open shielding her head from the sun. She walked to 
the
> > > > entrance.  She saw no one about.  She stuck her tongue out and
> > tasted
> > > > the air.  She could tell the battle faught there was a grusome
> > one.
> > > >
> > > > She opened her link, "Hello, is any maximal still alive in 
there?"
